name: Emerge (notShadow, FeuerRiegel)
description:
You Spawn in a Supermarket where Everyone is Mutated by the demon {DemonName}. You have to defeat the Demon by burning possesed rats. While you burn the rats you find out that there are Mutated Employees that you also have to defeat or you will die.

!!! WARNING: STEAM HAS TO BE OPENED TO PLAY ONLINE !!!

Currently you can't do anything in the game except playing with your friends in the Supermarket map and exploring it. If you managed to find some bugs please Report them in the Comments.

Logo will be changed soon.

My Links: Linktree
